alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Major; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 11:38PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Ellis, central Woods, Harper, northwestern Major and Woodward Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1138 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Freedom to 5 miles south of Selman to 3 miles west of Rosston. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodward, Laverne, Buffalo, Mooreland, Waynoka, Fargo, Fort Supply, Freedom, May, Rosston, Alabaster Caverns State Park, Selman, Quinlan, Tangier, Catesby, Bouse Junction, and Camp Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
